## FASTElement.disconnectedCallback() method

The disconnected callback for this FASTElement.

**Signature:**

```typescript
disconnectedCallback(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This method is invoked by the platform whenever this FASTElement becomes disconnected from the document.
